mapper.select: SELECT p.uid, p.area_id, p.course_id, p.`name`, p.type, p.`year`, p.question_info FROM tiku_paper p where p.type = #{type} and p.area_id = #{areaId}
SELECT p.uid, p.area_id, p.course_id, p.`name`, p.type, p.`year`, p.question_info FROM tiku_paper p where p.area_id = #{areaId} order by down_hits desc
SELECT p.uid, p.area_id, p.course_id, p.`name`, p.type, p.`year`, p.question_info FROM tiku_paper p where p.school_id = #{schoolId}

SELECT p.area_id, (select a.name from tiku_area a where a.uid = p.area_id) as area_name, p.course_id, (select c.name from tiku_course c where c.uid = p.course_id) as course_name, p.down_hits, p.`name`, p.open_hits, p.question_info, p.school_id, (select s.name from tiku_school s where s.uid = p.school_id) as school_name, p.type, p.uid, p.`year` FROM tiku_paper p
p.name like #{name}

SELECT p.area_id, p.course_id, p.down_hits, p.`name`, p.open_hits, p.question_info, p.school_id, p.type, p.uid, p.`year` FROM tiku_paper p
p.creater_id = #{createrId}
